description: Number of n-input 3-output switching networks under action of complementing group C(2,n) on inputs and S(3) and C(2,3) on outputs
references: M. A. Harrison, On the number of classes of switching networks, J. Franklin Instit., 276 (1963), 313-327.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10
Index entries for sequences related to switching networks
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Aug 10 2011
